message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth $80 to you, and we're willing to start negotiations at $75. Let me know if this works for you!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $65 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. We appreciate your interest in our product. To continue our negotiation, we would like to propose a price of $70 for the product.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. I would like to counter with a price of $68 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. Considering the value of the product to you, we would like to propose a price of $69 for the product.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. I would like to counter with a price of $67 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. We understand your position and would like to propose a price of $68.50 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I would like to counter with a price of $67.5 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. Considering the value of the product and your interest, we would like to propose a price of $68 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I would like to counter with a price of $67.5 for the product.
